verses.verse: In <WG1722> the mean time <WG3739>, when there were gathered together <WG1996> an innumerable multitude <WG3461> of people <WG3793>, insomuch that <WG5620> they trode <WG2662> one upon another <WG240>, he began <WG756> to say <WG3004> unto <WG4314> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> first of all <WG4412>, Beware <WG4337> ye <WG1438> of <WG575> the leaven <WG2219> of the Pharisees <WG5330>, which <WG3748> is <WG2076> hypocrisy <WG5272>.

But <WG1161> I will forewarn <WG5263> you <WG5213> whom <WG5101> ye shall fear <WG5399>: Fear <WG5399> him, which after <WG3326> he hath killed <WG615> hath <WG2192> power <WG1849> to cast <WG1685> into <WG1519> hell <WG1067>; yea <WG3483>, I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213>, Fear <WG5399> him <WG5126>.

But <WG1161> he that denieth <WG720> me <WG3165> before <WG1799> men <WG444> shall be denied <WG533> before <WG1799> the angels <WG32> of God <WG2316>.

The life <WG5590> is <WG2076> more <WG4119> than meat <WG5160>, and <WG2532> the body <WG4983> is more than raiment <WG1742>.
